name: Roll your skills
description:
Hello! I present my game. In wich you will have to play with new difficulities or improvement every time! Try your luck and let me know how many points you got!

That's a little tip for you! At the very beginning you will fall some enhancements or, on the contrary, additional difficulties. To start, there are two types of attack short-range and long-range.

Invisibility - opponents will disappear at random.

Don't Jump - Jumping is disabled

-1 Life - From the start you lose 1 life

Vampire - With 25% chance you can knock out a bottle of healing fluid from an opponent

+1 Life - At the start you have one more life

Bleed - Every 10 seconds you will lose 1 life

Скорость - Ваша скорость бега будет случайным образом изменена.

Видение - Ваше зрение будет случайным образом изменено
